line_art_bw.name: Black & White Line Art
line_art_bw.description: Simple clean lines, perfect for K-2 coloring
line_art_bw.base_prompt_suffix: , black and white line art, clean simple lines, coloring book style, no shading, clear outlines
line_art_bw.negative_prompt: color, shading, gradient, photorealistic, complex details, text, labels, numbers, watermark, blurry

cartoon_3d.name: 3D Cartoon Style
cartoon_3d.description: Colorful, friendly, Pixar-like style for ages 6-10
cartoon_3d.base_prompt_suffix: , 3D cartoon style, Pixar-like, colorful, friendly, smooth shading, child-appropriate, vibrant colors
cartoon_3d.negative_prompt: photorealistic, scary, violent, dark, grim, text, labels, watermark, signature, blurry, deformed

illustrated_painting.name: Illustrated Painting
illustrated_painting.base_prompt_suffix: , illustrated painting style, textured brushstrokes, educational illustration, vibrant colors, artistic rendering
illustrated_painting.negative_prompt: photographic, overly cartoonish, childish, text, labels, numbers, watermark, low quality

realistic.name: Photorealistic
realistic.description: Realistic scientific diagrams for upper grades
realistic.base_prompt_suffix: , photorealistic, scientific accuracy, high detail, educational photography style, clear and sharp
realistic.negative_prompt: cartoon, stylized, artistic interpretation, text, labels, watermark, blurry, low resolution
